user.title: ETA Step 1
user.description:
Enter the host and port of your ETA terminal. If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/christofpichler/meinETA-ha 

 Note: Depending on the total number of endpoints of your ETA terminal, getting all possible sensors can take a very long time! Have patience when you click on Submit.

Select the old API mode if you have problems with the new ETA API.

init.title: Initialize options
init.description: Select whether sensor values and/or the sensor list should be refreshed. Higher parallel request values increase ETA unit load and may cause errors, especially on older units. Use lower values for older units.

write_value.name: Set value
write_value.description: Sets the value of an endpoint (Attention: Exercise caution! A wrong value can render your ETA unit unusable.)

endpoint_url.name: Endpoint URI
endpoint_url.description: URI of the endpoint (only the numeric part, without host and port) (see http://[eta_host]:[eta_port]/user/menu)

begin.name: Begin
begin.description: Optional start time in 15 minute increments since midnight

end.name: End
end.description: Optional end time in 15 minute increments since midnight

write_value_scaled.name: Set scaled value
write_value_scaled.description: Sets the value of an endpoint, applying the scale factor defined in the ETA API

value.name: Value
value.description: The value to be set (in human-readable format)

force_decimals.name: Force decimals
force_decimals.description: If enabled, decimal places will be preserved even if the ETA API does not support them for this endpoint (may lead to errors!)

write_timeslot.name: Update a timeslot
write_timeslot.description: Update the begin and end of a timeslot endpoint

begin.name: Begin
begin.description: The start time of the timeslot

end.name: End
end.description: The end time of the timeslot

write_timeslot_plus_temperature.name: Update a timeslot and its target temperature
write_timeslot_plus_temperature.description: Update the begin, end and temperature of a timeslot endpoint

begin.name: Begin
begin.description: The start time of the timeslot

end.name: End
end.description: The end time of the timeslot

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The target temperature within the timeslot
